title: Bee
summaries: Bees are small flying enemies that are spawned by the Queen Bee in the Underground Jungle, and will also appear when destroying a Bee Hive and occasionally when mining Hive blocks that make up the Bee Hive biomes. They are not to be confused with summoned bees from the Bee Gun, the Bee Keeper, The Bee's Knees, the Beenade, or the Honey Comb â€“ these bees are friendly projectiles. In Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), Bees will inflict the Poisoned debuff to players.
